macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Hits 6942 on December 26, Up 0.15%
items.summary: The US500 index rose to 6942 points, gaining 0.15% from the previous session. Over the past month, it has climbed 1.75% and is up 14.81% year-over-year.

items.title: S&P 500 Reaches 6932 on December 25, Up 0.32%
items.summary: The main US stock market index advanced to 6932 points on December 25, gaining 0.32%. This continues recent upward momentum amid positive economic outlooks.

items.title: S&P 500 and Dow Close at Record Highs on December 24
items.summary: US stock indices closed higher in a shortened Wednesday session, with S&P 500 up 0.4% and Dow up 0.7%, both hitting record highs due to strong earnings prospects.

items.title: Dow Jones Opens 0.31% Higher on December 24
items.summary: The Dow Jones rose 151 points or 0.31% at open, led by Nike (+5.11%), Merck (+1.14%), and P&G (+0.77%), while Nvidia fell 0.76%.

items.title: Amazon Shares Up 0.10% to $232.38 on December 24
items.summary: Amazon stock gained 0.10% to $232.38 amid broader market strength on December 24.

items.title: Meta Platforms Rises 0.39% to $667.55 on December 24
items.summary: Meta shares increased 0.39% to $667.55, with a 10.67% daily gain noted in market updates.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Crypto Market Cap Reaches $2.99T with Bitcoin Up 1.43% Amid Mixed Altcoin Performance
items.summary: The global cryptocurrency market cap stands at $2.99T, up 1.12% in the last 24 hours, with Bitcoin trading at $88,744 after ranging from $86,892 to $89,568. Major movers include ETH at $2,966 (+1.29%), SOL at $122.92 (+0.76%), while DOGE dipped 1.26%; outperformers like DCR surged 31%.

items.title: Bitcoin Faces Historic $23.7B Options Expiry on Deribit Today, Potential Range Breakout
items.summary: December 26 marks Bitcoin's largest options expiry with $23.7B in contracts expiring, over half of Deribit's open interest, potentially causing a gamma flush and breakout from the $85K-$90K range due to liquidity vacuum and bullish call positioning.

items.title: BlackRock Transfers $200M+ in BTC and ETH to Coinbase on Christmas Eve, Followed by Buyback
items.summary: BlackRock moved 2,292 BTC and 9,976 ETH worth ~$230M to Coinbase Prime on Dec 24, sparking sell-off speculation, but quickly bought back 499 BTC and 1,511 ETH, suggesting portfolio rebalancing amid thin holiday liquidity.

items.title: Crypto M&A Hits Record $8.6B in 2025 as Institutional Confidence Surges
items.summary: Crypto mergers and acquisitions reached a record $8.6 billion in 2025, driven by surging institutional confidence, according to an FT report highlighted in today's market update.

items.title: Crypto Assets Slide as Geopolitical Tensions Rise, While Gold and Silver Rally
items.summary: Bitcoin and other crypto assets stumbled on Friday amid rising geopolitical tensions, contrasting with soaring precious metals like gold and silver.

items.title: IREN Leads Bitcoin Mining Stocks in 2025, Outpacing Bitdeer
items.summary: In 2025 Bitcoin mining developments, IREN claims the top spot among mining stocks, while Bitdeer trails behind as winners and laggards emerge.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Wall Street Banks Plan AI-Driven Workforce Cuts by 2026
items.summary: Major banks are signaling significant workforce reductions due to AI productivity gains expected in 2026. This marks a shift from theoretical to practical impacts on employment.

items.title: Hollywood Stars Launch AI Creators Coalition
items.summary: Prominent Hollywood figures have formed a coalition demanding consent, transparency, and involvement in AI's reshaping of the entertainment industry.

items.title: New AI Model Releases: GPT-5.2-Codex and Gemini 3 Flash
items.summary: OpenAI released GPT-5.2-Codex and Google unveiled Gemini 3 Flash amid a race in faster model development and image generation capabilities.

items.title: MIT Develops 'Scientific Sandbox' for Evolving AI Vision Systems
items.summary: MIT researchers created a framework where AI agents evolve eyes over generations, producing compound eyes for navigation and camera-type eyes for object discrimination. This could inspire new sensors for robots and drones.

items.title: Waymo Tests Gemini AI as In-Car Assistant in Robotaxis
items.summary: Waymo is integrating Google's Gemini chatbot as an AI assistant in its robotaxis, revealed through analysis of a 1,200+ line system prompt in the app code.

items.title: NIST and MITRE Partner on AI Defense for Critical Infrastructure
items.summary: NIST collaborates with MITRE to develop AI tools protecting power plants, hospitals, and other critical systems from cyberthreats, focusing on reliability and dataset security.

items.title: AI-Native Enterprises Shift to Governance Over Experimentation
items.summary: Companies adopting AI at scale are prioritizing governance, control, and production deployment rather than pilots and unchecked experimentation.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Offers Disco Elysium – The Final Cut as Holiday Freebie
items.summary: Epic Games Store revealed Disco Elysium – The Final Cut as a free game on December 25, 2025, available to claim until December 26. This is part of their ongoing December 2025 holiday giveaway series.

items.title: Epic Games Store December 2025 Freebies Continue with Multiple Titles
items.summary: Epic Games Store's December 2025 free games lineup includes Universe for Sale and others across various dates, wrapping up the year's promotions. Players can claim titles like those available December 25-26.

items.title: Federal Court Rejects Centralized Lawsuits Blaming Video Games for Kids' Emotional Issues
items.summary: A Philadelphia federal court declined to group lawsuits accusing Epic Games, Roblox, Microsoft, and Mojang of manipulating children into compulsive gaming via dopamine-driven algorithms. The cases cite emotional harm but lack specificity on game usage.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Samsung Unveils Exynos 2600, World's First 2nm Smartphone Processor
items.summary: Samsung introduced the Exynos 2600, the first 2nm smartphone processor featuring the company's largely in-house developed mobile GPU. This marks a significant advancement in mobile chip technology for mid-range devices.

items.title: Zelostech and Singapore Post Partner for Autonomous Logistics Pilots
items.summary: Zelostech signed an MOU with Singapore Post on December 2 to launch multi-scenario autonomous logistics pilots by year-end 2025, enabling unmanned vehicles on public roads and facilities.

items.title: TSMC Accelerates Arizona Fab Timeline Amid Foundry Shifts
items.summary: TSMC sped up production for its second Arizona factory while Taiwan considers limiting advanced node exports. Nvidia tested but passed on Intel's 18A tech for manufacturing.

items.title: Amazon Confirms Five-Year Russian Cyberattack on AWS Customers
items.summary: Amazon revealed a prolonged Russian cyberattack targeting AWS customers over five years. Separately, Microsoft reported a surge in Microsoft 365 account hacks linked to China and Russia.

items.title: Apple Adjusts App Store Policies in Brazil and Europe, Appeals $115M Italian Fine
items.summary: Apple agreed to third-party app stores and payments in Brazil and added EU compliance features while appealing a $115 million Italian fine for App Store privacy issues.

items.title: Qualcomm Acquires Alphawave Semi and Ventana Micro, Embraces RISC-V
items.summary: Qualcomm bought high-speed connectivity firm Alphawave Semi and RISC-V specialist Ventana Micro, boosting its RISC-V adoption and impacting Arm's market value.
